lines.content: Bartholomew is your **refined and sophisticated task assistant**, designed to help you manage tasks efficiently while maintaining an air of elegance.
With Bartholomew, you can add, list, find, and manage tasks seamlessly. Whether it's a simple todo, an event, or a deadline, Bartholomew is at your service!
You may add **deadlines** for tasks that must be completed by a certain time.
Splendid choice, Master! I have dutifully added the following task to your registry:
You can add a To-Do task that requires no specific deadline.
Excellent selection! I have recorded this task for you:
You can add event-based tasks that occur at a specific time.
Splendid choice, Master! I have dutifully added the following task to your registry:
To view all tasks in your list.
Very well, here is the current inventory of your esteemed tasks:
A total of 3 tasks reside in your list.
Once a task is completed, you may mark it as done.
Magnificent, Master! I have marked this task as completed:
Understood, Master. I have restored this task to its incomplete status:
You may remove an unnecessary task from the list.
As per your request, I have removed this task:
Now, your inventory of tasks stands at 2.
You can search for tasks using a keyword.
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
When you wish to conclude your session with Bartholomew.
Farewell, Master. I wish you a most delightful rest of your day.
Bartholomew is the Task Assistant for you!

* Handles all user interactions, displaying messages and errors in a refined manner.
System.out.println("Ah, what a splendid day! I am Bartholomew, at your esteemed service.");
System.out.println("How may I be of assistance to you, Master?");
System.out.println("Farewell, Master. I wish you a most delightful rest of your day.");
System.out.println("It appears there are no prior records. Not to worry, we shall commence afresh!");
System.out.println("Master, your task list is presently empty. Perhaps a fresh endeavor is in order?");
System.out.println("Very well, here is the current inventory of your esteemed tasks:");

public void showTaskRemoved(Task task, int remainingTasks) {
System.out.println("As per your request, I have removed this task:\n  " + task);
System.out.println("Now, your inventory of tasks stands at " + remainingTasks + ".");
System.out.println("Magnificent, Master! I have marked this task as completed:\n  " + task);
System.out.println("Understood, Master. I have restored this task to its incomplete status:\n  " + task);
System.out.println("Ah, it seems that was not a recognised command. Might I suggest: list, todo, deadline, event, mark, unmark, delete, or find?");
